org.pepstock.charba.client.intl

Class DateTimeFormatWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.intl.AbtsractFormatWrapper<NativeDateTimeFormat,Date,IsDefaultDateTimeFormatOptions>
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.intl.DateTimeFormatWrapper

  • final class DateTimeFormatWrapper
extends AbtsractFormatWrapper<NativeDateTimeFormat,Date,IsDefaultDateTimeFormatOptions>
    It wraps the NativeDateTimeFormat JavaScript object in order to format dates.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private static class  DateTimeFormatWrapper.ResolvedOptions
      Wrapper of a date time format options in order to be consumed by its interface, when the resolve options methods has been invoked.
      Wrapper is need in order to return only the interface with "get" methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static NativeObject EMPTY_OPTIONS 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DateTimeFormatWrapper(CLocale locale, DateTimeFormatOptions options)
      Creates object that enables language sensitive date time formatting, using the locale options and specific options.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) String format(Date value)
      Formats a value according to the locale and formatting options of this object.
      (package private) ArrayObject formatToParts(Date value)
      Returns an array of objects containing the locale-specific tokens from which it possible to build custom strings while preserving the locale-specific parts.
      It is useful for custom formatting of value strings.
      (package private) IsDefaultDateTimeFormatOptions resolvedOptions()
      Returns a new object with properties reflecting the locale and value formatting options computed during initialization of this object.

        DateTimeFormatWrapper(CLocale locale,
                      DateTimeFormatOptions options)
        Creates object that enables language sensitive date time formatting, using the locale options and specific options.
        Parameters:

        options - options to configure the date time format

      • formatToParts

        ArrayObject formatToParts(Date value)
        Description copied from class: AbtsractFormatWrapper
